snippet.title: The Sims 3 Showtime Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Make your Rise to Fame with The Sims 3™ Showtime. Available on origin.com

Live out the rags to riches story with your Sims as a singer, acrobat, magician... and moonlight as a DJ. Watch your Sims rise to fame as they perform on stage in front of cheering crowds in all new venues.  New, optional online features allow you to connect with friends and share your big moments through in-game messaging.

Order on Origin.com now: http://store.origin.com/store/ea/en_US/html/pbPage.sims3_showtime
